name: Vexatious Martyr
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You host a swarm of malignant spirits inside of you. Each time you take damage, three spirits, plus one per 10 damage taken, emerge from you, targeting any number of creatures you choose within range. For each spirit targeting a creature, they are affected by a Vexatious Traveler spell. A creature that fails a saving throw against one spirit fails all subsequent saving throws from the same group of spirits.

You can't have your concentration broken by damage while concentrating on this spell.
